煰煰煰

煰字的基本解释

煰
zào
古同“燥”。

煰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zào］
［《廣韻》蘇老切，上晧，心。］
［《集韻》先到切，去号，心。］
亦作“煰1”。
(1)缺少水分；干燥。
(2)指使干燥。
(3)燥热。
(4)指使燥热。
(5)焦急；焦躁。
(6)中医指病因“六淫”之一。
(7)指药性干热；燥烈。
(8)书法用语。指用墨少。
[②]［sào］
亦作“煰2”。
(1)方言。快速。
(2)害臊。参见“燥2不搭”。
(3)见“燥2子”。

煰字的康熙字典解释

【補遺】【巳集】【火字部】　煰； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页678第16
【五音篇海】果到切。乾燥也。

煰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
煰字的起名意思

暂无。

煰
Basic explanation of words
煰
zào
Gu Tong is "dry".
煰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zào］
["Guangyun" Su Laoqie, Shang Hao, Heart. ]
["Jiyun" first come to cut, go to number, heart. ]
Also known as "煰1".
(1) Lack of moisture; dry.
(2) Means to dry.
(3) Dry heat.
(4) Indulge in hotness.
(5) Anxious; anxious.
(6) Traditional Chinese medicine refers to one of the "six evils" of etiology.
(7) Refers to the medicinal nature of dry and hot; dry and strong.
(8) Calligraphy terms. Refers to using less ink.
[②]［sào］
Also known as "煰 2".
(1) Dialects. fast.
(2) Ashamed. See "Dry 2 does not match".
(3) See "Zao 2 sons".
煰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Addendum] [Siji] [Fire Word Department] 　煰; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 678 16
[Five Yinpianhai] The fruit is cut. Dry also.
煰
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
煰
Name meaning
Nothing.
zào, sào
I
zào
同“燥”。
II
sào
同“燥”。
